gplib.base.gpbase.PopulationGP¶

class gplib.base.gpbase.PopulationGP(initializer, sequential, viewer, terminal_condition, **kwargs)[source]¶

base class of population based GP

__init__(initializer, sequential, viewer, terminal_condition, **kwargs)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • n_generations – int. the number of generations
  • initializer – population initializer object. initializer of population
  • sequential – sequential object. genetic operators
  • viewer – viewer object. viewer for population based GP

Methods

__init__(initializer, sequential, viewer, …)
param n_generations:
 int. the number of generations
